name: Acupuncture
description: Acupuncture and traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) are good options to combine with western medicine to give you well-rounded care. At East West Health Services, their mission is to create optimal wellbeing through holistic TCM services and education. Their health and wellness team includes licensed acupuncturists, herbalists and massage therapists. They also partner with a range of allopathic and complementary health practitioners, researchers, and educators to support patients in a holistic ap
